headlines.shortLinkText: Vertonghen, Alli score as Spurs win at Newcastle

headlines.description: Promoted Cardiff City's first Premier League match for four years ended in a 2-0 defeat by Bournemouth.
headlines.shortLinkText: Fraser, Wilson help Bournemouth beat Cardiff

headlines.description: Goals by Jeffrey Schlupp and Wilfried Zaha helped Crystal Palace to a 2-0 win against Fulham at Craven Cottage on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Schlupp, Zaha strike as Palace win at Fulham

headlines.description: Chelsea manager Maurizio Sarri made a winning start to life in the Premier League as his team enjoyed a 3-0 win over Huddersfield Town.
headlines.shortLinkText: Chelsea's Sarri gets winning start at Huddersfield

headlines.description: Roberto Pereyra scored twice as Watford opened their Premier League campaign with a 2-0 victory over Brighton & Hove Albion at Vicarage Road.
headlines.shortLinkText: Pereyra shines as Watford beat Brighton
Wolves salvage late draw vs. 10-man Everton
